# Projet AD et EMS

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(reshape2)
library(FactoMineR)
library(factoextra)
library(corrplot)
library(reticulate)
```

```{r}
#| echo: True
Data = read.table("DataGym-projet4modIA-2526.csv",header=TRUE)
```

```{r}
head(Data)
```

```{r}
corrplot(cor(Data[,-c(2,8,12)]), method="ellipse")
```

# ACP centrée réduite (car les variables ne sont pas à la même échelle).

```{r}
respca <-PCA(Data,scale.unit=T,graph=F,quali.sup = c(2,8,12))
fviz_eig(respca)
respca$eig
```


```{r}
fviz_pca_ind(respca,habillage=2)
fviz_pca_var(respca)
```

```{r}
fviz_pca_ind(respca,habillage=12)
```



```{r}
fviz_contrib(respca,choice="ind",axes=1)
```
